name: Plume and the forgotter letter
description:
Discover the adventures of Plume through a WebGL video game, a child who decides to bring her letter to Santa Claus by herself.

This game was create for Christmas Experiments 2018 opening.

https://plumegame.com

Credits :

Alexandre Delalleau - 3D Generalist, Level Design, Art Direction, Motion Designer

Nicolas Mathis - 3D Design, Modeling,  Art Direction

Patrick Heng - Creative Developer, Game Designer, Motion Designer

Fabien Motte - Creative Developer, Game Designer, Motion Designer

Louis Gabriel Gonzalez - Original Soundtracks, Sound Designer
